query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS automated_responses (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  response_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  trigger_type ENUM('virustotal_detection', 'threat_intel_match', 'manual', 'scheduled') NOT NULL,
  condition_config TEXT NOT NULL,
  action_type ENUM('block_ip', 'send_alert', 'isolate_candidate', 'send_email', 'webhook') NOT NULL,
  action_config TEXT NOT NULL,
  enabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  priority INT DEFAULT 50,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_trigger_type (trigger_type),
  INDEX idx_enabled (enabled)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS response_logs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  response_id INT NOT NULL,
  candidate_id INT,
  trigger_data TEXT,
  action_taken VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  action_result ENUM('success', 'failed', 'pending') NOT NULL,
  result_details TEXT,
  executed_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_response_id (response_id),
  INDEX idx_candidate_id (candidate_id),
  INDEX idx_executed_at (executed_at)
)
command:

  action_config TEXT NOT NULL,
  enabled INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  priority INT DEFAULT 50,
  created_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_trigger_type (trigger_type),
  INDEX idx_enabled (enabled)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS response_logs (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  response_id INT NOT NULL,
  candidate_id INT,
  trigger_data TEXT,
  action_taken VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  action_result ENUM('success', 'failed', 'pending') NOT NULL,
  result_details TEXT,
  executed_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_response_id (response_id),
  INDEX idx_candidate_id (candidate_id),
  INDEX idx_executed_at (executed_at)
)
